content: the heathered eyelets wrap is modern beautiful and easy to work up basic stitches produce beautiful eyelets making it a fun project to crochet and is perfect for anytime of year self-striping yarn is a great option for this pattern but it would equally beautiful in a solid color yarn too if you need a little extra help there s a full video tutorial too **this pattern is free on the blog or you can purchase the ad-free pattern pdf here on ravelry **
